Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 116th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1965...
Injured on 5/11/1967 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 4/14/1968 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Released by Baltimore on 7/31/1969...
Drafted in 4th round, 79th overall pick, by Boston in 1972...
Injured on 4/30/1972 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/19/1972 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/28/1973 with a Broken Knee, out for full season...
Injured on 9/8/1976 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1977, off Jim Slaton (CHW)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/29/1977, off Dennis Higgins (CLE)...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/1/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
